summary: Building a shopping aggregator website that indexes products from multiple e-commerce platforms including Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, BlinkIt, and other shopping centers
architectural_notes: Multi-platform e-commerce aggregator requiring product data indexing from Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, BlinkIt, and other shopping platforms
Will need product search and filtering capabilities across aggregated data
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Amazon logo icon for platform badge (amazon-logo.dim_64x64.png)
- Flipkart logo icon for platform badge (flipkart-logo.dim_64x64.png)
- Meesho logo icon for platform badge (meesho-logo.dim_64x64.png)
- BlinkIt logo icon for platform badge (blinkit-logo.dim_64x64.png)
- Generic shopping bag icon for other platforms (generic-shop.dim_64x64.png)
- Search icon illustration for the product search feature (search-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage with a welcoming hero section that includes a headline and subheadline
Implement a navigation header with links to main sections of the website
Add an about section that provides information about the website or its purpose
Create a footer with basic information and links
Apply a creative, cohesive visual design with a distinct aesthetic style using warm earth tones, elegant typography, and a modern minimalist layout that feels professional and inviting

Create a Products page in the frontend that displays the indexed products from all shopping platforms in a grid layout with product cards showing image, name, price, platform badge, and a link to the original product
Add a search bar component to the Products page that allows users to search products by name or filter by platform
Update the navigation header to include a Products link that navigates to the new Products page
Update the Hero section headline and subheadline to reflect the shopping product index functionality across Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, BlinkIt, and other platforms

new_feature_requests.summary: Create product index/catalog from other shopping centers
Implement unified product search across all indexed platforms
Create a backend data model to store product information including name, price, description, image URL, category, platform source (Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, BlinkIt, or other), and product URL
Implement backend functions to add products from Amazon to the product index
Implement backend functions to add products from Flipkart to the product index
Implement backend functions to add products from Meesho to the product index
Implement backend functions to add products from BlinkIt to the product index
Implement backend functions to add products from other shopping platforms to the product index
Implement backend search functionality to query products across all indexed platforms by name, category, or platform filter
